title: Why MVC is so important
contents: MVC allows developers to maintain a separation of concerns, with a Model layer for data, a View layer for design, and a Controller layer for application logic.

title: Authentication vs. Authorization
contents: The difference is that authentication means confirming your own identity and authorization means being allowed access to the system.

title: Object-Relational Mapping
contents: ORMs helped me to simplify the way queries are created in SQL.
